vWashington House Rabbit Newsv

Volume 7  Issue 1 March 1998


Send Us Your Photos

Are you a proud parent of an adopted HRS foster bun? We'd love to include his/her photo in the newsletter.

Just send a current photo of your bunny and include a paragraph about him/her and the date of adoption.

Please write your name and bunny's name(s) on the back of each photo, and send it to HRS, attention: Newsletter Photo.

If you'd like your photo sent back to you, please don't forget to include a self-addressed stamped envelope.
